infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Store Locator needs to use Face ID / Touch ID to authenticate you
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Store Locator needs to use Location to send notifications when you near a store
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Store Locator needs to use Location to send notifications when you near a store
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Store Locator needs to use Location to send notifications when you near a store
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Store Locator needs permission to create new calendar items to store new events
